name: Beef and Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A hearty stir fry featuring beef and a mix of colorful vegetables.
steps: 1. Slice the beef into thin strips. Wash and peel the carrot and potato, then cut them into thin julienne strips. Wash the tomato and chop it into cubes.
2. In a frying pan or wok, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat.
3. Add the beef to the pan and stir fry for about 3-4 minutes until browned.
4. Add the carrot and potato strips, stirring for another 5 minutes or until they are tender.
5. Finally, add the chopped tomato and sugar, cooking for an additional 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
6. Remove from heat and serve hot.

name: Sweet Potato and Tuna Salad
description: A refreshing salad combining tuna and roasted sweet potatoes with a touch of sweetness.
steps: 1. Preheat your oven to 200째C (392째F).
2. Peel the sweet potato and cut it into cubes. Place them on a baking sheet.
3. Drizzle with a bit of oil and sprinkle with sugar. Roast in the oven for about 20-25 minutes or until tender.
4. In the meantime, boil the egg in water for 10 minutes, then cool and peel.
5. In a bowl, combine the canned tuna, chopped tomato, and roasted sweet potato once ready.
6. Chop the boiled egg and add it to the salad. Mix thoroughly and serve.

name: Egg and Fish Breakfast Scramble
description: A quick breakfast scramble featuring eggs and flaky fish.
steps: 1. Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk well, adding a pinch of salt (if desired).
2. Heat a non-stick frying pan over medium heat and add the fish, cooking for about 3-4 minutes until flaky.
3. Add the chopped tomato and cook for an additional minute.
4. Pour the whisked eggs into the pan and stir gently.
5. Cook while stirring until the eggs are just set but still creamy.
6. Serve hot with toast or on its own.

name: Pasta with Tomato and Egg
description: A simple yet delicious pasta dish topped with fresh tomatoes and poached eggs.
steps: 1. Bring a pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
2. While the pasta is cooking, wash and chop the tomatoes.
3. In a small saucepan, poach the eggs in simmering water for about 4 minutes until the whites are set.
4. Drain the pasta and return to the pot, adding in the chopped tomatoes and sugar. Stir well.
5. Serve the pasta topped with the poached eggs.
6. Optionally, you can add a sprinkle of salt and pepper to enhance the flavors.

name: Banana and Apple Smoothie
description: A fruity smoothie perfect for breakfast or a refreshing snack.
steps: 1. Peel the banana and chop it into smaller pieces.
2. Wash and chop the apple, removing the core and seeds.
3. In a blender, combine the banana, apple, and sugar.
4. If desired, add a cup of water or ice to achieve your preferred smoothie consistency.
5. Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

name: Tomato and Potato Bake
description: A comforting baked dish with layers of tomatoes and potatoes.
steps: 1. Preheat the oven to 180째C (356째F).
2. Peel the potato and slice it thinly (about 0.5 cm).
3. Wash and chop the tomatoes into slices.
4. In a baking dish, layer the potato and tomato slices alternately, sprinkling sugar between layers.
5. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes.
6. Remove foil and bake for another 15 minutes until the potatoes are soft and golden on top.
7. Serve hot.
